screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.maxco: The respawner will stop after spawning this many mobs.

NBT tag: MaxConnectedEntities
Type: int
Default: 1
screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.spawn: If it is allowed to, the respawner will attempt to spawn this many mobs every tick. Warning: High numbers can cause lag.

NBT tag: SpawnCount
Type: int
Default: 1
screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.requi: The player needs to be this close to the respawner before it can spawn anything.

NBT tag: RequiredPlayerRange
Type: int
Default: 16
screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.spawn: The respawner will only spawn mobs inside this range.

NBT tag: SpawnRange
Type: int
Default: 2
screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.entit:
Defines what the respawner will spawn.

Tip: The respawner can read NBT data from custom spawn eggs. Using multiple will cause their NBT to get mixed up inside the respawner. Try it out!
screen.respite_bench.mob_respawner.conne: UUID list of entities spawned by this block. Used to keep track of entities spawned by this block.

NBT tag: ConnectedEntitiesUuid
Type: compound[{UUID}, ...]
Default: empty
text.autoconfig.respite_bench.title: Respite Bench Config
text.autoconfig.respite_bench.option.fla: Drinking a flask will heal you for this amount.
Time required to drink a flask (in ticks).
text.autoconfig.respite_bench.option.ben: Disable sitting on the bench. Does not disable other features of it.
Allow benches to clear your potion effects.
Allow benches to change your spawn point.
text.autoconfig.respite_bench.option.mob: Makes respawners ignore all spawn conditions (requiring grass for animals, low light levels for hostile mobs, etc.).
